CustomField.description: The maximum number of user stories that will be deployed together when a deployment is scheduled
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Set to 1 to deploy each story individually. Batching deployments speeds up the process but causes all stories in a batch to succeed or fail together. This can delay the deployment of some stories and make it harder to identify the cause of errors.
CustomField.label: Scheduled Back-Promotion US Group Size
